name: FPV Air Tracks
summary: Experience the rush of FPV racing and even develop real life drone flight skills with the life-like physics found in this sim.

name: FPV Drone Simulator
summary: This FPV Drone Simulator is especially designed for practicing your drone flying skills! Fly in different environments. Choose 'free ride' or 'fantasy forest'.

name: FPV Event
summary:
Drone First Person Video Simulation game.

Website: http://www.dronesimulation.co.uk/index.html

name: FPV Freerider
summary: RC quadcopter racing simulator.

name: FPS: Fun Puzzle Shooter
summary: FPS - Fun Puzzle Shooter is a first person game with a totally different proposal. Here the objective is not to kill other creatures, but to hit the correct targets to finish the levels.

name: FPV Freerider Recharged
summary:
RC Quadcopter Racing Simulator -

Fly (and crash!) all you want regardless of the weather, all for the price of a few replacement props.

name: FPV Air 2
summary: FPV Air 2 is a quadcopter flight simulator for serious FPV racing pilots who want a tool for meaningful/realistic flight practice in any weather.

name: FPSBois
summary: Hey, it's ya bois: FPS Bois! That online military shooter feel without the big corporate pricetag!

name: FPS Training
summary: FPS Training is a game designed to train your skills in FPS (First Person Shooter) games. The game includes a series of challenges that will train all of your skills, such as aiming, reflexes, recoil control and more!

name: FPScore
summary: FPScore is a multiplayer shooter based on the Quake III Arena. The game was published in cooperation with the Czech video game magazine Score. The game contains maps that are partly inspired by reality (Muzeum metro station in Prague, radar in Brdy), as well as sci-fi maps and map clones from Counter-Strike (namely Assault, Dust). FPScore contains original graphics (textures and models), completely new sounds and music.

name: FPV Speed Drone
summary: The FPV Speed ​​Drone is set in an environment where an actual international game was held. It provides a realistic FPV drone racing flight experience. Compete with your friends and set the best record!

name: FPS Tactics
summary: Control a group of special agents, find a monster on the map and place the agents so that they can defeat the monster

name: FPV Air 2: Bando Freestyler
summary: Bando Freestyler makes FPV Air 2 about more than just racing! New environments packed with all the dives, gaps and exciting locations you need for freestyle practice.

name: FPV Simulator
summary: Feel the rush of a racing drone and the freedom of flying like a bird trying to defy the laws of gravity.

name: FPS Arena Online
summary: FPS Arena Online (F.P.S.A.O) is a Novelty Online Multiplayer "Among Us Style" first-person shooter experience. Battle your friends in a casual social first-person shooter environment. Join matches of up to 10 players max. Conquer the arena & assert your dominance among the other players.

name: FPAH: Foul Play Air Hockey
summary: FPAH is a player-versus-player air hockey you can play as foul as you want.

name: FPS Chess
summary:
Play an ordinary game of chess against a friend or a stranger.
However, all your intricate strategies will crumble before the enemy rook's sniper trick-shot.
All your practiced openings and counters will amount to nothing before the enemy queen's randomly sprayed machine gun.
You finally checkmate the king. Unfortunately, it seems you are not ready for this fight. 5 seconds in and you've been sliced in half by the king's sword.
It turns out you are not playing Chess at all, but an FPS. Just make sure to practice your aim!

name: FPS War
summary:
This great first person shooter can be fun and challenging at the same time. Get ready to fight and complete all objectives to unblock new guns. You can have 4 guns in total and have to survive more than 50 enemies while trying to get all laptops scattered around the map. At the end, you got to go to the Main Server, access it and try to escape successfully.

This is a great war simulator where you can walk around in a 3D world and shoot with a great amount of weapons.

name: FPS War 2
summary: In this game, you have an arsenal of guns that must be unlocked while you're accomplishing missions. Your objective is simple: after you stole all laptops with essential informations in the previous game, now your aim is to steal all ammunitions and bombs you can!

name: FPS Seduce: Hentai
summary: Make love to many beautiful anime girls in this First Person Shooter hentai masterpiece. The girls wants you and your... tool. To be able to reach the maximum orgasm. You will be alone with all these girls in an open world city. They will try to make you cum, it is your duty to make them cum first!

name: FPS1
summary: A short game about using an explosive bolt gun. Pin enemies with the bolt gun, then when the time is right, explode them!

name: FPVSIM FPV Simulator
summary: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that is designed & tuned for high consistency with research level quadrotor dynamics simulation engine.

name: FPV Logic
summary: FPV Logic is an FPV drone simulator with near-real physics and operation experience. Whether you enjoy freestyle or racing, you can find the same fun as flying a real drone in this game.

name: FPVSIM Drone Simulator
summary: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that combines great graphics with great stick feel, featuring high consistency with its machine learning powered quadrotor dynamics engine that's also also hand tuned by top drone racers around the world.

name: FPV SkyDive: FPV Drone Simulator - Flight School
summary: Continue your journey towards becoming a skilled FPV pilot with ORQA FPV.SkyDive Flight School DLC! This educational module covers the topics of FPV flight throughout 5 units packed with theory and practice.

name: FPV Kamikaze Drone
summary: "FPV Drone Kamikaze" is a fast-paced action game where players control a combat drone from a first-person perspective. The objective is to destroy enemy equipment in war using maneuvers and explosive devices. Speed and strategy will be the keys to victory.

name: FPS Russia: The Game
summary: FPS Russia: The Game is a shooter and endless runner game that is based on the YouTube channel FPSRussia.

name: FPS Pro Team Manager
summary: Recruit and manage the team of FPS players of your dreams, create your own strategies and rise to the top of the world's elite.

name: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator
summary: FPV Military Kamikaze Drone Simulator is an advanced and realistic early access game with kamikaze drones, grenade dropping, night vision and thermal imaging missions.

name: FPS Infinite
summary:
FPS Infinite is a "Metroidvania" (similar to Metroid Prime) where the enemies, weapons, levels and item placements are procedurally generated. You'll need to explore each unique world for new abilities, which will unlock new areas.

Your goal is to find the Forbidden Phr00t in each world, which will trigger the world to blow up. You must escape safely in the dynamically calculated time to win.

name: FP Racer
summary: A short solo racing experience in a minimalistic setting.

name: FPV Battleground
summary: FPV Battleground is a dynamic FPV drone control simulator with realistic physics. Players get the opportunity to control drones from a first-person perspective, maneuvering with maximum accuracy and efficiency. Your task is to destroy enemy vehicles using all the capabilities of FPV drones.

name: FPS Bullet Storm
summary: Become the Ultimate Soldier

name: FPV Worldwide
summary: Dive into our FPV drone simulator on Steam, featuring stunning global visuals with Unreal Engine 5. Share and discover spots, control the weather, use real drone controllers, and teleport anywhere. Perfect for drone enthusiasts.

name: FPS Robot Attack Minigame
summary: Minigame where you have to destroy robots to save the world

name: FPV Kamikaze Drone Simulator
summary: An intense FPV drone warfare simulator with online multiplayer and co-op modes. Take control of modern kamikaze drones in a high-adrenaline combat experience where precision, speed, and tactics decide your success. Play solo or team up with friends to destroy enemy tanks, vehicles, and bases.

name: FPS Quest
summary: An FPS where FPS is your health. If you play poorly, performance drops. Tweak settings on the fly, lower graphics, break the rules, and create glitches to survive.
